title: Askyblock插件不刷怪什么情况
author: jfyddb
txt_content:
求解决
askyblock插件不刷怪
刷怪蛋和刷怪笼都可以刷怪

replies.author: jfyddb
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-24 18:02
/gamerule doMobSpawning true
设置多世界困难模式已经设置了
/gamerule doMobSpawning true也用了
不刷怪

replies.author: jfyddb
replies.txt_content:
正才 发表于 2019-7-24 18:35
插件的配置问题
哪个配置

replies.author: jfyddb
replies.txt_content: 修改bukkit.yml中的刷怪效率即可，或者删除然后启动，会变回正常

replies.author: xaunye
replies.txt_content:
jfyddb 发表于 2019-7-28 20:12
修改bukkit.yml中的刷怪效率即可，或者删除然后启动，会变回正常
自问自答？

replies.author: jfyddb
replies.txt_content:
xaunye 发表于 2019-7-29 13:38
自问自答？
发了贴结果在别的地方找到了解决方案

replies.author: a87339531
replies.txt_content:
我之前也这样,已经完美解决,检查空岛的config  
spawn:
  # The following are recommended to be true at spawn
  allowdooruse: true
  allowleverbuttonuse: true
  allowchestaccess: true
  allowfurnaceuse: true
  allowmusic: true
  allowcrafting: true
  allowbrewing: true
  allowgateuse: true
  allowanimalspawn: true
  allowmobkilling: true
  allowenchanting: true
  allowanviluse: true
  allowpressureplates: true
  allowvisitoritemdrop: true
  allowvisitoritempickup: true

  # The following are recommended to be false at spawn, but you can change
  allowbreakblocks: false
  allowplaceblocks: false
  allowredstone: false
  allowanimalkilling: false
  allowmobspawn: false
检查代码allomobspawn 是否开启,改为true 即可
